pageTitle: Statement by the Prime Minister of Canada on the results of the Saskatchewan election | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
The Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, today issued the following statement on the results of the provincial election in Saskatchewan:

“The people of Saskatchewan have chosen to re-elect a government led by the Saskatchewan Party.

“On behalf of the Government of Canada, I offer my sincere congratulations to all elected Members of the Legislative Assembly, particularly Brad Wall who continues to have the honour and privilege to serve as Premier of this great province.

“I look forward to working with the Government of Saskatchewan in a spirit of cooperation and collaboration.”
